name: Basketball Challenge 3D
description:
Swipe the ball to shoot and make the best score. You can miss the ball only 3 times. Be careful!

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive basketball game.

Suitable for all ages and enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends.
